biotools.summary:
An integrative resource for investigating genetic model of drug response in cancer.

An integrative database for investigating genetic model of drug response in cancer.

iGMDR database collects predictive models of response for anti-cancer drugs.

The efficacy of anticancer drugs usually varies from individual to individual, mainly due to genetic heterogeneity
